ticket.title: Warn Users When Creating Reserved Column Names in Migrations
ticket.original-body: I always catch myself trying to make columns named type or version, and I'm sure that there are several other column names that shouldn't be allowed. It would be nice if migrations would warn you when you try to name your columns that as an extra bit of protection against wasting time renaming column names.

version.title: Warn Users When Creating Reserved Column Names in Migrations

version.body: Sounds like a good idea. Got patch?
